I have a feeling I'm going to live in this jumpsuit come spring/summer! I will definitely be buying more colors/patterns!

评论概述: Love this clothing line and style!
评论详情: Very cute! The fabric for the print is a lighter weight than the solids and absolutely perfect for warmer climates.  I'm not exaggerating when I tell you I've purchased this style at least a dozen times, in a two different sizes, as it is very forgiving, and flattering, during weight changes.

Super cute romper. Really soft. No stretch though, so order accordingly. It is a tad bit big for sizing though. Wear a true size large but the large is a bigger than normal. It is hand wash and line dry only. It WILL SHRINK(in length-tall girl problems) even hand washing so please keep that in mind. Has adjustable straps and replacement links for the adjusters are well.
The material is not as expected. The pictures make it look very soft and flowy and it is the opposite. Definitely NOT worth the price!! I put it on and took it off immediately. Just no.
I bought the print with the Tigers. Love the fabric; it's a light weight cotton. Perfect outfit for a humid day in the summer. I'm about to buy several more and get a collection going.
made me look frumpy
I absolutely love this romper and wish there were more dark color options!! My mom bought 2 already 🤣🤣🤣

Super cute jumper. Purchased 3 (Black floral, blue floral, cream floral) for a tropical vacation and ended up wearing them more than the dresses I had. So many complements too. I thoroughly enjoyed wearing them in the very hot and humid weather. Very thin, see thru in sunlight (even in black) or if what you're wearing underneath is darker than the color/pattern of the jumper. Washed and dried perfectly, no shrinkage. I'm 5'7", 165lbs, 38C and I bought Mediums. They were all about the same size with slight length discrepancies in each but that didn't bother me. They hung just above the top of my feet and looked great with chunky sandals, platforms and wedges. Completely flat sandals made them drag at times so if you're shorter I would avoid flats in a size Medium. They did "grow" a bit as the day progressed which for me, wasn't an issue since I was not looking for tight fitting clothes in that type of weather. I think they look better as a late spring & summer jumper because of how thin they are which makes tanks and tees look best underneath.

On hot, muggy days when it’s too sticky out to wear jeans or when your event requires something dressier than shorts, but you want an easy, casually stylish look, this is a go-to outfit.  You can wear many different types of shirts underneath, or even a pullover on top.  The clasps on the adjustable straps could be more robust, but they sent an extra set - - probably a sign they know the quality of the clasps are not the best.  The material is light and airy, not clingy.  I’m happy with the product!
compliments every time I wear this. And comfortable.
Good outfit to throw on but very thin. No zippers or buttons just put on and go. Great color

I tried the straps all the way back and it made them longer, but the look was not as good. So I adjusted accordingly. 5’4 128 pounds small fit perfect. Pockets are great. Would I pay full price? No, but if they go on sale again half price I would definitely get the other patterns. Material seems light but not see through.

I'm 5'11", 225 lbs and I ordered 2X because it was recommended (and there were no larger sizes available.) They are very thin, suitable for summer or anytime if you're having hot flashes. It reaches my ankles but not much farther. I haven't washed it yet so it might end up being Capri pants. The straps are thin - I wouldn't stress them. There is elastic at the waist, on the sides. It pulls the sides of the romper to your waist creating a nice silhouette instead of looking like you're wearing something from Omar, the tent maker. But it's not warm or substantial. It's really made for the beach or that kind of thing. But for $12.98, I'm thrilled. Oh, wait...shipping made it more like $21, but, still... It would take me hours to cut it out and make it myself.
